feed.title: ShellHub Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.14.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(ssh): send IP to firewall when ssh wihtout session is requested by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3455
  • bump(ui): update vite to 5.0.1 by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3452
  • fix(ssh): let client decide whether can connect to a device that has a potentially broken version or not. by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3454
  • ui: bump vite from 5.0.11 to 5.0.12 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3457
  • ui: bump terser from 5.26.0 to 5.27.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3459
  • ui: bump @rushstack/eslint-patch from 1.6.1 to 1.7.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3460
  • ui: bump dotenv from 16.3.1 to 16.3.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3461
  • ui: bump eslint-plugin-vue from 9.19.2 to 9.20.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3462
  • fix(ui): warning on watcher callback on v-overlay loading screen by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3468
  • fix(ui): added class to center loading on appLayout by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3471
  • fix(ui): create store meant to be used only by NewConnection list by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3472
  • fix docker compose binary by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3473
  • config: bump shellhub version to v0.14.2 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3475

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.14.1...v0.14.2

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.14.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor api queries by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3420
  • refactor(ssh,ui): use messages for web ssh connection by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3463
  • docker: agent: bump alpine from 3.19.0 to 3.19.1 in /agent by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3480
  • docker: cli: bump alpine from 3.19.0 to 3.19.1 in /cli by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3481
  • docker: ssh: bump alpine from 3.19.0 to 3.19.1 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3482
  • docker: api: bump alpine from 3.19.0 to 3.19.1 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3483
  • ui: bump @rushstack/eslint-patch from 1.7.0 to 1.7.2 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3484
  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.4.10 to 3.5.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3486
  • chore(deps): bump dorny/paths-filter from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3489
  • ui: bump @vue/test-utils from 2.4.3 to 2.4.4 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3488
  • ui: bump @sentry/tracing from 7.92.0 to 7.98.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3485
  • feat(ui): mfa recovery login redirect to disabling dialog by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3491
  • normalize per_page by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3492
  • Add missing healthcheck entries by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3477
  • ui: bump axios from 1.6.5 to 1.6.7 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3487
  • add ';' at the end of the gateway health check return statement by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3496
  • chore: define env variable to gateway bind address by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3495
  • fix device update by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3501
  • config: bump shellhub version to v0.14.3-rc.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3502
  • fix(agent): don't send trash to SFTP when agent is running on host by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3509
  • config: bump shellhub version to v0.14.3 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3510

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.14.2...v0.14.3

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.15.0
entry.content:
After two months of dedicated work since our last stable release on February 3rd, we're excited to release ShellHub v0.15.0! This release is packed with new features, improvements, and several fixes.

Thank you for your continued support and contributions to ShellHub! We're excited about these new features and improvements, and we look forward to your feedback. Stay tuned for more updates!

What's Changed

  • ui: bump @sentry/tracing from 7.98.0 to 7.99.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3511
  • ui: bump @sentry/vue from 7.92.0 to 7.99.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3515
  • ui: bump @types/node from 18.19.7 to 18.19.14 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3514

  • ui: bump vee-validate from 4.12.4 to 4.12.5 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3513
  • fix(agent): don't allow negative time for keepalive on agent by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3516
  • feature(pkg): add log format to loglevel package by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3518
  • remove deprecated query packages by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3521
  • refactor namespace update route by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3519
  • fix(agent): use the right binary on production stage for Dockerfile by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3520
  • feat: namespace's connection announcement by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/3508
